solution_line_template: If the price of a lawnmower was ${previous_price} a year ago, {price_increase_fraction} less than the cost right now, then it now costs {price_increase_fraction}*{previous_price} = ${price_increase} more to buy one lawnmower.
The total cost of buying one lawnmower right now is ${previous_price}+${price_increase} = $<<{previous_price}+{price_increase}={current_price}>>{current_price}
To purchase {number_of_lawnmowers} such lawnmowers, Mr. Lucian will have to pay ${current_price}*{number_of_lawnmowers} = $<<{current_price}*{number_of_lawnmowers}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
